articles.author: Deidre McPhillips
articles.title: Emergency room visits for firearm injuries among children doubled during the pandemic - CNN
articles.description: America’s gun epidemic has become deadlier than ever for children since the start of the Covid-19 pandemic, and firearm-related injuries are driving children to emergency rooms at significantly higher rates than before.
